comments: Diallo (DET) cleanly blocks Rozier's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Diallo (DET) and Rozier (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.

McDaniels (CHA) receives the inbound pass while airborne and his left foot lands on the midcourt line  as he returns to the floor, which establishes McDaniels in the backcourt. A player is allowed to move into the backcourt to receive an inbound pass in the last two minutes.  There is an inadvertent whistle on the play and CHA is given possession.
Zeller (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in Diallo's (DET) path and absorbs the contact.
Diallo (DET) extends his arm forward and initiates contact across Rozier's (CHA) front, affecting Rozier's SQBR as he moves around the screen.
Hayes (DET) and Ball (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Rozier (CHA) brings his off-arm toward Diallo's (DET) front and marginal contact occurs as Rozier naturally releases away.
Diallo (DET) legally contests Rozier's (CHA) jump shot attempt. Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Stewart (DET) firms up in his screening position in Ball's (CHA) path and absorbs the side-to-side contact.
Hayes (DET) brushes Ball's (CHA) left arm and marginal contact occurs prior to Ball's gather.

Jackson (DET) is bringing his arm into a vertical position when marginal contact occurs with Ball's (CHA) left arm, which Jackson absorbs. Stewart (DET) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact made with Ball during the driving shot attempt thereafter.
Ball (CHA) initiates contact across Stewart's (DET) arm after he secures the rebound.
Rozier (CHA) extends his leg and creates the marginal contact with Diallo (DET) during the jump shot attempt.
Jackson (DET) rests his hands on Zeller's (CHA) back and marginal contact occurs as Zeller jumps toward the ball during rebounding.
Bey (DET) initiates contact across Rozier's (CHA) right arm after he secures the rebound and has started his upward shooting motion.
Jackson (DET) and Rozier (CHA) come together at the same spot during the drive and marginal contact occurs to Rozier's front as Jackson's off-arm naturally comes forward.
Rozier (CHA) legally contests Jackson's (DET) driving shot attempt.
Biyombo (CHA) cleanly back-taps the ball before incidental contact occurs with Jackson (DET) during rebounding.
Ball (CHA) and Hayes (DET) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound.
Ball (CHA) grasps and then quickly releases Hayes' (DET) right arm during the drive.
Hayes (DET) has his hand extended forward and marginal contact occurs with Ball's (CHA) arm/front during the drive.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the call on the floor of Martin (CHA) stepping out of bounds stands.
Biyombo (CHA) rests his hands on Stewart's (DET) hips as he moves to set the pick and quickly removes them.
McDaniels (CHA) reflexively places his arms around Stewart's (DET) upper half as the pick is set and quickly releases thereafter.
Biyombo (CHA) rests his hands on Stewart's (DET) hips as he moves to set the pick and quickly removes them.
Stewart (DET) initiates contact with McDaniels' (CHA) jersey and upper half that restricts his ability to defend in the lane.
Hayes (DET) and Ball (CHA) engage and disengage with one another during the inbound. After the initial contact, Hayes and Ball make incidental foot-to-foot contact with one another.
Replay review of the foul called on Biyombo (CHA) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Biyombo moves into Hayes (DET) and initiates body contact during the driving shot attempt.
Bey (DET) commits a take foul on Ball (CHA).
Biyombo (CHA) legally contests Hayes' (DET) jump shot attempt.
